topics.body:
"@Princess♠Molestia":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54e9972263687218635d0400#post_54e9972263687218635d0400
[bq="Princess♠Molestia"]I have to ask, do you guys see me as a social justice warrior? I only ask because Im the guy who puts "to be fair" after a post about a sjw thing. Unless the subject is an awful person, mind you. And will sometimes agree with their points.[/bq]
Definitely not. There's value in trying to understand two sides of an argument. And as far as agreeing with them, I haven't seen any of your posts about it but considering the screen name you post under, I don't think it'd be anything too crazy. It is a group of people founded with good intentions that got co-opted by self centered crazy people so not everything they say is wrong.

topics.body:
I had a dream that I woke up at 6 AM and read that the weather report said it would get up to 128F randomly in the middle of the week while it remains at about 90F in the other days.

I woke up at 9:30 AM actually, and the weather report calls for 70F weather all week.

Extreme disappointment.
!http://i.imgur.com/m8Zm3Zd.gif!
